動物用藥品名稱: 維克犬兒健犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、犬小病毒活毒混合疫苗
業者名稱: 臺灣維克法蘭斯股份有限公司
地址: 1 ERE AVENUE, 2065 M L.I.D., 06516 CARROS, FRANCE
效能(適應症): 預防犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎及犬小病毒感染症。
ingredients: LIVE ATTENUATED CANINE DISTEMPER VIRUS (LEDERLE STRAIN).......................................................AT LEAST 10^3 TCID50,LIVE ATTENUATED CANINE CONTAGIOUS HEPATITIS VIRUS (MANHATTANSTRAIN)......................................AT LEAST 300 TCID50,LIVE ATTENUATED CANINE PARVOVIRUS (CPV 780916 STRAIN)...........................................................AT LEAST 10^5 TCID50
